SCRIPT.MSCRI:
! -------------------------------Preparing arguments to connect to the server------------------ ! PYTHON FILE PATH : SET &UC4RB_OSB_CMDEXEC# = "java &UC4RB_OSB_JAVA_OPTIONS# weblogic.WLST "
: SET &UC4RB_OSB_CMDEXEC# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_OSB_CMDEXEC#, " ""&PYTHON_FILE#""")
! PREPARE URL : SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = &UC4RB_OSB_HOST_NAME# : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_ORACLE_OSB.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE : SET &URL# = "&UC4RB_OSB_PROTOCOL#://&UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#:&UC4RB_OSB_PORT#"
: SET &UC4RB_OSB_CMDEXEC# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_OSB_CMDEXEC#, ' "&URL#"')
! USERNAME : SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = &UC4RB_OSB_USERNAME# : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_ORACLE_OSB.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE : SET &UC4RB_OSB_CMDEXEC# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_OSB_CMDEXEC#, ' "&UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#"')
! DECRYPT PASSWORD : SET &UC4RB_ENCRYPTED_PASSWORD_TMP# = "&UC4RB_OSB_PASSWORD#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.DECRYPT_PASSWORD
: SWITCH &$PLATFORM# : CASE "WINDOWS" : SET &UC4RB_OSB_CMDEXEC# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_OSB_CMDEXEC#, ' "%UC4_DECRYPTED_PWD%"') : CASE "UNIX" : SET &UC4RB_OSB_CMDEXEC# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_OSB_CMDEXEC#, ' "$UC4_DECRYPTED_PWD"') : OTHER : ENDSWITCH !Connection Time Out : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_ORACLE_OSB.PRV.INCLUDE.LOAD_PCK_PARAMETERS : SET &UC4RB_OSB_CMDEXEC# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_OSB_CMDEXEC#, ' "&UC4RB_OSB_CONNECTION_TIMEOUT#"')

DOCU_Docu.DOC: This include is used to build the java command for connecting to OSB server as per the specified inputs.
